titleStmt.title: The stumbling-block of disobedience and rebellion, cunningly laid by Calvin in the subjects way, discovered, censured, and removed. By P.H.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Cotes for Henry Seile over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The stumbling-block of disobedience, &c. discovered, censured and removed.
Quire 2F (p. 217-224) is not present; text is continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffeb: 16:"; 8 in imprint date crossed out and "7" written in.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
